derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from Italian cartone (see cartoon)

entry.tran: （装食物或饮料的）塑料盒，硬纸盒
entry.def: A carton is a plastic or cardboard container in which food or drink is sold.
A carton is a large, strong cardboard box in which goods are stored and transported.

means.word_mean: 1. the quantity contained in a carton
2. a box made of cardboard; opens by flaps on top
